original_text: You shall overlay it with pure gold, inside and outside shall you overlay it, and you shall make on it a molding of gold around it.
korean_text: 너는 순금으로 그것을 싸되 그 안팎을 싸고 위쪽 가장자리로 돌아가며 금 테를 두르고

sentences.original_text: You shall overlay it with pure gold
inside and outside shall you overlay it
you shall make on it a molding of gold around it
